text: Daniel Fabrizi (Born February 22, 1992) is a Canadian soccer player who last played for Toronto FC II. ==Club career== Fabrizi played for York University for four years. In his final year in 2014, York won both the OUA and CIS championships, with Fabrizi earning OUA West first-team all-star honours. In 2010, he played in the Canadian Soccer League with TFC Academy. Fabrizi signed his first professional contract with Toronto FC II on March 20, 2015. He made his debut for the club against the Charleston Battery on March 21. Fabrizi was let go at the end of the 2015 season as his contract was not renewed . ==References== ==External links== * York Lions profile Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:TFC Academy players Category:York Lions soccer players Category:Toronto FC II players Category:USL Championship players Category:Canadian Soccer League (2006–present) players
title: Daniel Fabrizi
